metadata.usage: Read an input file and convert smiley strings into PNG images.
metadata.info: Usage: smiley2png -f FILE -s NUM [-h|help] OPTIONS: -f|--file FILE - input file with Fname (png format) and Smiley string per line Example line: img1.png CCCCCC Valid file name can contains "-_." and alpha-numeric characters and ends with ".png" -s|--size NUM - integer NUM for geoometry (NUM x NUM) of the output images. Examle: 200. -h|--help - prints usage

param.textDesc: Input file (see help for format description)
Output files geometry as an integer (for example: 100)
